short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your public IP address. Zero permissions required. No signup. No ads. No tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Just IP Address" browser extension is a simple, privacy-friendly way to reveal your public IP address with one click. Here are some features that make it stand out:

- Zero permissions required. You can trust that your information is secure as our extension does not need any permissions to run.
- No 3rd party trackers or ads. We value your privacy and ensure that the extension does not contain third-party trackers or ads that may compromise your data.
- Memory-efficient. The extension only runs when you click the icon, so it won't slow down your device with unnecessary background processes.
- Dark mode. Choose between the light and dark modes.

What's the catch / why it's free?

This extension is created by HeroTofu.com, we have both free and paid products. Our paid products help pay for the cost of creating and maintaining the free ones, like the "Just IP Address" extension.

This means we can give you the extension for free, without any hidden costs.
